config.title: Vibe Notes
config.copyForLLMPrompt.description: Prompt text to prepend when copying notes for AI/LLM. Leave empty to copy without prompt.
config.copyForLLMPrompt.markdownDescript:
Prompt text to prepend when copying notes for AI/LLM. Leave empty to copy without prompt.

**Default:** `Please review and implement the following code feedback:`

**Note:** To restore the default value, edit settings.json and remove this property.
config.copyForLLMIncludeCode.description: Include code snippets when copying notes for AI/LLM. Disable to reduce token usage.
config.copyForLLMIncludeCode.markdownDes:
Include code snippets when copying notes for AI/LLM.

**When enabled:** Notes include the actual code being referenced, providing full context.

**When disabled:** Only note comments are included, reducing token usage.
